game.name: Parcel Delivery Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 택배 회사에 입사했지만 상사가 떠납니다. 이제 당신이 책임자입니다. 소포를 배달하고 계약을 체결하며 사무실을 확장하세요. 차량을 구매하고 직원을 고용해 최고의 택배 회사를 만드세요. 시뮬레이션 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You've landed a job at a courier company, but your boss has to leave town. Now you're the boss. Deliver packages, sign new contracts, expand your office, buy new vehicles. Hire employees, set up parcel lockers around town, and create the most profitable courier company in the world. Simulation game.
